thread.title: Wonderful hotel, great location and terrific staff.

author: H2790YDjanetp
title: Wonderful hotel, great location and terrific staff.
text: The hotel is close to a Tube stop and that makes it especially convenient. It is located in a very nice area, close to embassies and other business. The staff was fantastic and went out of their way to assist me.
